Harrisonburg.Bridgeforth Stadium and Zane Showker Fie:
Bridgeforth Stadium and Zane Showker Field is a football stadium located on the campus of James Madison University in Harrisonburg, Virginia. The stadium is home to the James Madison University Dukes football team.
Bridgeforth Stadium, with a seating capacity of 24,877, is currently the largest stadium in the Colonial Athletic Association and 13th largest at the NCAA Football Championship Subdivision level.
